house_listing.house_description: Best townhome value in va beach. Nearly 1000 sqft, centrally located. Newly painted, new carpet, new roof w/25 yr warranty,central air & heat. Minutes to interstate & bases. Neighborhood watch in cul-de-sac comm. Huge attic w/rm to convert to 3rd bdrm.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Fenced, Ranch Style,Storage Space, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
